title: Valid Article Title
content: This is a properly formatted article with sufficient content. It discusses important topics and provides useful information for readers. The content meets the minimum length requirement and is well-structured.
author: John Doe

title: Article with HTML artifacts
content: This content has HTML tags that need removal. Also has entities and “smart quotes” mixed in. alert('xss') should be stripped.
author: Jane Smith

title: Extra Multiple Spaces Here
content: Content with irregular spacing throughout. Multiple newlines and tabs mixed in.

title: Article with special chars: café, naïve, 日本語
content: Unicode and special characters: café résumé naïve. Em-dash - here. Symbols: © ® ™. Mixed encodings may appear.
author: José García

title: Complete Record
content: A fully valid record with clean data. All fields are present, properly formatted, and meet validation criteria. URL is valid, content is long enough, and title exists.
author: Complete Author

title: Malformed Date Record
content: Content with non-standard date format that needs normalization. Various date formats exist in scraped data.
author: Date Tester

title: US Date Format
content: American date format in the metadata. MM/DD/YYYY style dates need conversion to ISO format for consistency.
author: US Author

title: Trailing and Leading Whitespace Everywhere
content: Content surrounded by whitespace on both sides.
author: Space User

title: Duplicate HTML Entities
content: Ampersand: & &. Less than: <. Greater than: >. Quote: ". Apostrophe: '.
author: Entity Tester
